entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • libmsquic not on Debian 11 package repository? #60104
  • `Console.ReadKey` returns incomplete VT sequences for bracketed paste #60101
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames failed on release coreclr windows x86 Debug #60097
    7.0.0
  • StreamPipeWriter leaks BufferSegment ownership #60090
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests SIGABRT on release mono OSX x64 Debug #60088
  • Default value for optional ctor params should be used when matching prop is ignored #60082
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfiler EventPipe callbacks do not properly increment/decrement the evacuation counters #60081
    7.0.0
  • Consider removing ".dll" from the "const string HostPolicy = "hostpolicy.dll" #60080
  • Json.Serialization.Converters.DictionaryDefaultConverter ignores custom converters for Enum keys. #60079
  • Activity.SetParentId does not change RootId and Id #60078
    7.0.0
  • Make KeyValuePair<,> support in JSON src-gen mode trim-safe #60072
    7.0.0
  • Linux/arm64: Assertion failed 'assignedInterval->isLocalVar' #60070
  • [mono] Pass Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 in SIMD registers whenever possible #60068
    7.0.0
  • HostedBackground service sometimes freeze #60067
  • Broken dependencies in Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #60066
  • [API Proposal]: Customizable IConfigurationRoot.GetDebugView() for hiding the value #60065
    7.0.0
  • `build.cmd` fails with latest VS 2022 dogfood #60061
  • BranchTrue not behaving the same way on ARM64 as AMD64 for a R8 value #60052
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation Fault occurs on ARM and ARM64 with GTKSharp Library. #60051
  • Browser AOT leg failing in compilation on Regex source generator tests #60048
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Can't download .NET 5 SDK 5.0.401 x86 binaries #60011
  • Font tests are failing on Mono #60059
  • Single-file publishing should be deterministic #60041
  • [s390x] Missing full RELRO (-z,now) support in a mono-based libcoreclr.so #59904
    7.0.0
  • Feature Request: IParseable<T> interface for all types implementing Parse() and TryParse() #26538
    Future
  • JIT\opt\OSR\tailrecursetry\tailrecursetry.cmd fails with COMPlus_FastTailCalls=0 #35687
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Make field nodes unary #60105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove SkipOn NetFramework attributes in System.Reflection.Emit tests #60103
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Finish59071 update ci argsh for r6.0 #60100
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move more pipelines to scheduled rather than rolling #60099
  • Merge src/tests/run.proj into src/tests/build.proj #60098
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't create a symbols archive in a PGO build. #60096
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove dead code #60095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Arm64: Unordered floating non-equality comparison #60089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid using Uint8Array to set memory content #60087
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #60084
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix libcoreclr.so build incompatibilities on Linux #60077
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Refactoring CharEntityEncoderFallback for System.Private.Xml #60074
    area-System.Xml
  • Optimize code readability in Debugger.cs #60071
    community-contribution
  • Enable host.pkg subset in source-build #60069
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not check options values if options haven't been initialized in BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding test #60062
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #60058
    area-Single-File
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60053
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add tests exposing issue #60035 #60047
  • [release/6.0] Show error dialog in single-file app when runtime is missing #60045
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.0
  • Pick up a new build of Xunit #60044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix typo in comment for UseUtcTimestamp #60043
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution

Merged

  • Override `corehost_resolve_component_dependencies` and `corehost_set_error_writer` PInvokes in singlefile scenario. #60046
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit in BigInteger #59951
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0] Fix byte array handling in STJ sourcegen #60004
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix performance-setup Function Definitions #60102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, tenet-performance
  • [mono] Implement coreclr_create_delegate and move ComponentActivator to shared CoreLib #59962
    area-Interop-mono
  • Updated channel passed to ci_setup in the performance-setup.sh file. #60034
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Fix codeql checks #59839
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.0
  • [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59500
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix libcoreclr.so build incompatibilities on Linux #59988
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debug compilation using cmake #60029
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update branding for 5.0.12 #60007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Errors in performance-setup Scripts From PR 59483 #60073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, tenet-performance
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix win-x64 outgoing argument size calculation for PInvoke prolog helper #60050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve regex reductions and code gen for some alternations #59903
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix inconsistencies in order of GeneratedDllImport fields #60049
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use custom error message when running out of syncblocks #60013
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove the runtime-specific `Stream` source files. #60019
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable providervalidation runtime test on MonoVM. #59994
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Block out the test Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericTest on arm64 pending investigation #60039
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update signed wix version for arm64 fixes #60008
    packaging, area-Infrastructure
  • Add a Reverse P/Invoke scenario for profiler transition tests. #60038
    increase-code-coverage, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add PreciseRefCountsRequired method #60027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add R2RTest support for the perfmap-format-version Crossgen2 option #60002
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #59989
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Additional RPMs for CBL-Mariner #59548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 5.0.x
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Fix benign assert in gtNewTempAssign #59991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ISMETHOD and ISMETHODHASH macros #59993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Correctly Save GC Mode on Suspension on Windows for SampleProfiler #59974
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I am trying to compile a .net core app, seeing linking errors.. #1634
  • Reproducible and verifiable NativeAOT builds #1632
  • Determinism for NativeAOT #1631

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM : merge from main (includes MethodTableOf) #1636
  • Add asserts for maxBit in BDD range conversions #1633

Merged

  • Clean up remaining RegexSRMTests and fixed some todo's #1630
  • update args for official builds #1635
  • Merge upstream runtime main into feature/s390x #1629

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support workloads installed via Visual Studio from CLI `dotnet workload` commands #21811
    6.0.2xx
  • `dotnet workload` commands do not authenticate properly #21802
  • Right to Left Cultures for numbers #21793

Closed

  • DisableImplicitNamespaceImports=false doesn't disable DisableImplicitNamespaceImports_DotNet. #19465
  • Enable `-s` as a convenience over `--self-contained` #19576
    6.0.1xx
  • .NET 6 Preview 7 Blazor WebAssembly won't build if you are using a JsonSerializerContext implementation #19834
    6.0.1xx
  • When workload MSI package fails to download, output is not ideal #20143
    6.0.1xx
  • Revert main loc process when 17.0 pass is done #20650
    6.0.1xx
  • TimestampedFileLogger is eating a lot of CPU #21083
    6.0.1xx
  • Update man pages for .NET 6.0 #21449
  • --use-current-runtime semantics #14296
    Discussion
  • Redundant info is shown in dotnet –info if install .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21473.26 SDK on Windows #21553

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1406963 #21815
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove O# workaround from RazorSDK #21806
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Simplify hash implementation #21654
  • Update man pages #21557
  • Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime. #21748
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add CPD for installer #21803
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update build.yml #21059
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Allow pattern matching to satisfy type parameter constraints #5251

Updated

  • Complaining about documentation: async method builder types #5238

PullRequests

Created

  • Several corrections to task-types.md #5253

Merged

  • fix typos #5250

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose API to signify if an `or-expression` (`|`) surprisingly widened a sign extended value. #56994
  • Showing potential fixes doesn't have the actual fix of a warning #56990
  • Getting the "Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error" error #56985
    17.0
  • Need compiler to expose some way to get the information about CheckForBitwiseOrSignExtend #56977
  • VS Immediate Window (expression compiler) ignores stamenents after semicolon #56976
    Backlog
  • Convert codebase to use file-scoped namespaces #56973
    17.1

Closed

  • Visual Studio is busy hang with no resource usage #56988
    17.1
  • Diagnostics reported from a source generator should not require rebuilding project(s) to be updated and should display red/green squiggles at the location of the diagnostic #56928
  • CS8947 warning message mentions parameter type instead of its name #56447
    17.1
  • Definite assignment not recognized #56975
  • Suppress Diagnostic code fix is horribly wrong when multiline strings are present #56165
    Backlog
  • string "kind" is passed as exception message #50523
    Compiler.Next
  • Issue using EnvDTE.CodeClass.AddFunction with .NET 6 projects when *.cs is not open #56018
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use elastic end of line for file header code fix #56993
    Area-IDE
  • Add C# IOp api to let us know if a "surprising sign extension" occurred. #56992
    Area-Compilers, Needs UX Triage
  • Handle switch expressions inside function pointer invocations. #56991
    Area-Compilers
  • Only pass the lsp misc files workspace for non-VS scenarios. #56989
    Area-IDE
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/56314 #56986
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary options #56984
    Area-IDE
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE
  • Add more completion External Access APIs for F# and TS #56972
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56983
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update warning text and parameter #56968
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Next
  • BoundIsOperator - store `ConversionKind` instead of `Conversion` #56922
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add some watson reporting for an error that we're seeing in a cross host-oop-host scenario #56981
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56982
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56978
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56979
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56980
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add SolutionSessionId and ProjectsWithAppliedChanges telemetry properties #56947
    Area-Interactive, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • String splitter refactoring #56889
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Unify code for pragma placements #56285
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Annotate completion providers #56937
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify implementation of Inline-Temporary #56964
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't break if we fork a snapshot after freezing partial semantics #56890
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundCompoundAssignmentOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54472
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundUsingLocalDeclarations/BoundUsingStatement - don't store Conversion in the node. #56954
    Area-Compilers
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Move to a singleton storage service per process, instead of per workspace. #56916
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set resource message for exception in TypeDeclarationSyntax #51212
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • At what level does it make sense to deal with URLs that contain unicode hostnames #37337
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #37334
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #37333
  • Change the defaults for OpenIdConnectOptions.ResponseType #37328
  • Identity Server Logout Problem #37327
  • Errors from browserlink and aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js when logged into React app #37326
  • "Objects are not valid as a React child" error by default in React + Identity template #37324
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter has incorrect behavior in case of user-added EventHandler #37323
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Render Razor View or Partial to String #37187
  • signalr::websocket_transport’s start()'s lambda captures the transport as a shared_ptr #36807
    6.0.0
  • Access violation in cleaning up transport in connection_impl::stop_connection() #36808
    6.0.0
  • HubConnection's AccessTokenProvider handler gets called each request when SSL certificate is invalid #37332
  • StaticFileMiddleware can generate the same ETag after a file modification #37232
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, mvc #37299
  • Perf improvement: https #37319
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, endpoint #37320
  • Remove IKestrelTrace #31581
    Backlog
  • IndividualAuth Template Test Failures #37331
  • Inconsistent bool to string conversion #37283
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyTests.ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #37330
  • Resolve failure to resolve types with RSG #30851
    6.0.0
  • Blazor, the action object type is not disposed. #37315
  • Blazor JS interop: Provide a way to better control the JSON.stringify() process #37312
  • make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect work for Blazor WASM #37129
  • The PageTitle component doesn't update the title when navigating directly to a page #36967
    6.0-rc2
  • Unable to build components #35192
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly Component CSS not applied when running the published application! #35901
    Backlog
  • Startup regression: multiple_queries #37300
  • Blazor issue with generics ? #37295
    6.0.0
  • Add source index build step #33534

PullRequests

Created

  • Binary Logs for Test Jobs #37339
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve project reference consistency #37338

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Try out BuildProjectReferences=false in Components #37146
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Don't allow modifying WebRootPath after initialization (#37147) #37325
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Use WIX_NATIVE_MACHINE to detect native architecture of target machine #37335
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Add link for Razor tooling #37336
    7.0-preview1
  • Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37168
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove trace interfaces from Kestrel transports #37243
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Use WIX_NATIVE_MACHINE to detect native architecture of target machine #37318
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update WiX to build 5722 #37329
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [main] Update WiX to signed build #37317
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove IKestrelTrace #37242
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works #37309
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Set aria-current for manage pages #37274
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, 6.0.0
  • Use one-shot HMACSHA1.HashData() for Identity TOTP values #36724
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use F# task ce in worker template #36986
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37229
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 6.0.0
  • Merge bootstrap4 sxs support from release/6.0 #37294
    area-identity
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21480.20 #37192
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Honoring error information on OAuth Exchange Code #37224
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider relaxing the requirement to project out all properties in relational raw SQL queries #26266
  • Select Many use null conditional operator ? #26265
  • Database connection fails when the password is changed, but works when the application is restarted #26264
  • Allow static values for HasForeignKey / HasPrincipalKey #26263

Closed

  • Cosmos: FromSql allows omitting properties from the projection #26243
  • API xref errors #23260
    6.0.0
  • Error when modifying a primary key as a foreign key #26235
  • ObjectDisposedException on retrieval of a pooled DbContext #26202
    5.0.12
  • [BLOCKING] All Pomelo tests fail with the same service resolution exception after upgrading from 6.0 Preview 7 to 6.0 RC1 #26260

PullRequests

Created

  • fix : ensuring annotation white space. #26262

Merged

  • [6.0] Fix API docs errors #26261
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26259

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26255
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [6.0] Mark internal the ValueConverter constructors that allow conversion of nulls #26232
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated
